meanings.definition: Not having a point or sharp tip.
meanings.sent1: The dull pencil had an unpointed tip.
meanings.sent2: She carefully avoided the unpointed end of the stick.
meanings.sent3: The unpointed knife couldn't cut through the tough meat.
meanings.sent4: His unpointed remarks lacked impact in the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The unpointed arrow missed the target by a wide margin.

meanings.sent1: Her unpointed suggestion was easily overlooked.
meanings.sent2: The unpointed details faded into the background.
meanings.sent3: His unpointed joke went unnoticed by most of the audience.
meanings.sent4: The unpointed warning was lost in the sea of information.
meanings.sent5: The unpointed question was quickly forgotten by the group.

meanings.definition: Not marked with diacritical points or accents.
meanings.sent1: The unpointed letter caused confusion in pronunciation.
meanings.sent2: The unpointed text was challenging for non-native speakers.
meanings.sent3: His unpointed name was often mispronounced by others.
meanings.sent4: The unpointed words in the document made it hard to read aloud.
meanings.sent5: The unpointed vowels made the word sound unfamiliar.
